00325 
00326 inline 
00327 double double_compare::fabsval(double input)
00328 {
00329     return 0.0 <= input ? input : -input;
00330 }
00331 
00332 inline
00333 int
00334 double_compare::fuzzy_compare(double a, double b, 
00335                               double relative_tolerance, 
00336                               double absolute_tolerance)
00337 {
00338     if (a == b)
00339     {
00340         // Special case: equality. Done.
00341         return 0;
00342     }
00343 
00344     if (a == -b)
00345     {
00346         // Special case: Relative difference
00347         if (fabsval(a - b) <= absolute_tolerance)
00348         {
00349             // is "infinite"
00350             // Fuzzy equality (via abs. tol. only)
00351             return 0;
00352         }
00353         else if (a > b)
00354         {
00355             return 1;           // Fuzzy greater than
00356         }
00357         else
00358         {
00359             return -1;          // Fuzzy less than
00360         }
00361     }
00362 
00363     const double diff = fabsval(a - b);
00364     const double average = fabsval((a + b) / 2.0);
00365 
00366     if (diff <= absolute_tolerance || diff / average <= relative_tolerance)
00367     {
00368         return 0;               // Fuzzy equality.
00369     }
00370     else if (a > b)
00371     {
00372         return 1;               // Fuzzy greater than
00373     }
00374     else
00375     {
00376         return -1;              // Fuzzy less than
00377     }
00378 }
00379 
00380 inline
00381 bool
00382 double_compare::eq(double a, double b)
00383 {
00384     return fuzzy_compare(a, b, relative_tolerance_default, absolute_tolerance_default) == 0;
00385 }
00386 
00387 inline
00388 bool
00389 double_compare::eq(double a, double b, double relative_tolerance)
00390 {
00391     return fuzzy_compare(a, b, relative_tolerance, absolute_tolerance_default) == 0;
00392 }
